archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Energietransport en -netten waarnemen en omzetten in metingen
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om energietransport en -netten waar te nemen (net doorstroom, functie performance, net component eigenschap) en om te zetten in metingen (meetdata).

properties.value: Perceive energy flows and energy grids and transform into measurements
The ability to perceive energy flows and energy grids (net throughput, function performance, net component property) and transform into measurements (measurement data).
